title: Alphabet Soup

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player at night and add all of the letters in their role name to your piping-hot bowl of alphabet soup.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your bowl of alphabet soup starts with no letters. You will add each distinct letter in your target's role name to your soup (e.g. 733 will only add A, I, P, and R). If you add a letter that is already in your soup, it will instead be removed from your soup. You will not be informed of what particular letters were added to your soup, but your soup will always be up-to-date with all letters that it contains.
- You gain a buff based on how many letters are in your soup.
> - 3+ letters: Roleblock immunity.
> - 6+ letters: Astral visits.
> - 9+ letters: Basic defense.
> - 12+ letters: You may choose one player per day to learn their exact role.
> - 15+ letters: You will be informed of every player that visits your target and their individual roles.
> - 18+ letters: Powerful defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: End the game with at least 20 letters in your alphabet soup.
